product.name: Echo Dot (3rd Gen) - Smart speaker with Alexa - Charcoal Fabric
product.description: Echo Dot is a voice-controlled smart speaker with Alexa that's perfect for any room. Just ask for music, news, information and more. You can also call almost anyone, and control compatible smart home devices with your voice.

product.name: Beats Studio3 Wireless Noise Cancelling Over-Ear Headphones
product.description: High-performance wireless noise cancelling headphones Compatible with iOS and Android devices. Pure adaptive noise canceling (pure ANC) actively blocks external noise Real-time Audio calibration preserves a Premium listening experience Up to 22 hours of battery life enables full-featured all-day wireless playback

product.name: Nintendo Switch Neon Red/Neon Blue with Mario Kart 8 Deluxe
